item.title: How to support WAHA using Crypto
item.description: We have special ⚡50% OFF Yearly Crypto Offer!⚡ for you! In this article, we’re going to cover different techniques for those who not familiar with crypto payments how you can still support the project and get WAHA Plus and WAHA PRO. If you have any questions during this journey, kindly contact us at crypto@devlike.pro, we’ll find a way to help you! Get Crypto Address and Amount # Step 1 - Login to WAHA Portal # First, go to WAHA Patron Portal -> and Login with Email or any other available options.

item.title: ⚡50% OFF Yearly Crypto Offer!⚡
item.description: ⚡50% OFF Yearly Offer!⚡ Plus - $228 $110 PRO - $1,188 $590 Save the fees and get Plus or PRO for a year donating in crypto! Cryptocurrency - support the project with crypto! Go to Patron Portal, click Upgrade/Renew and choose Crypto in the options! Various cryptocurrencies available - BTC, ETH, LTC, USD, and others. If you don't have crypto or don't know how to deal with it, checkout our Step-by-Step Crypto Guide !
